title: Organization Role
description: A controlled vocabulary of roles that organizations may play within a WIGOS or GOOS program context (e.g., funder, operator, DAC).

organizationRoleId.description: Internal identifier for the organization role.

organizationRoleName.description: Label of the role the organization plays (e.g., Operating Agency, Funding Agency).

organizationRoleDescription.description: Description of the function or responsibility represented by this role.
